errors.noParamsProvidedToClass: No parameters were proided to the class:
errors.noParamsProvidedToMethod: No parameters were provided to the method:
errors.systemCurlFailedToSend: Curl failed to send data to client system:
errors.dialogItemsAndOptionsMismatch: Number of elements in dialogItems and dialogOptions are not equal.
errors.dialogItemsAndOptionsEmpty: Dialog items and/or options are empty.
errors.userControlNoParamsProvidedToClass: No parameters were provided to the user control:
errors.userControlImportFailed: Failed to import user's characters at the last stage.
errors.userNotFound: User or user ID not found.
errors.characterImportMismatch: Character mismatch during import. Legacy and import character amount are not equal.
errors.noImportUserFound: No user found while importing characters. This is weird, it means the DB thought it inserted successfully, even though it didn't. Commit failure?
errors.uuidImportMismatch: UUID mismatch during character import. This means legacy account data does not match the registered details.
errors.dbDataFailedSanitisation: Invalid data; did not pass sanitisation.
